member.name: T:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularBindingContext
member.summary: Represents the base class for AngularJS binding contexts.

member.summary: Gets the name of the model in the scope.

member.summary: Gets a string used to prefix properties for bindings.
member.param: The property delimiter.

member.summary: Creates an HTML attribute from the name and value provided.
member.param: The attribute name.
The attribute value.

member.name: T:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularBindingContext`1
member.summary: Generic AngularJS binding context that can be used to generate bindings.

member.summary: Gets HtmlHelper instance that this context is using.

member.summary: Gets the full HTML field name for the object that is represented by the expression.

member.name: T:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularConfiguration
member.summary: Contains configuration values.

member.name: P:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularConfiguration.ErrorCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CSS class to use for validation errors.

member.name: P:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularConfiguration.LabelCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CSS class to use for HTML label elements.

member.name: P:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularConfiguration.HelpCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CSS class to use for validation message elements.

member.name: P:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularConfiguration.RequiredLabelCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CSS class to add on labels for fields that are required.

member.name: P:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularConfiguration.DefaultControlValidationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default control validation mode for controls inside form elements.
member.remarks: This value will affect the way in which the method renders the ng-class directive.

member.name: T:SS.Mvc.Angular.ValidationMode
member.summary: Specifies when to show the validation messages for a field.

member.name: F:SS.Mvc.Angular.ValidationMode.FormDirty
member.summary: Validations are shown when the any control in the form is modified.

member.name: F:SS.Mvc.Angular.ValidationMode.ControlDirty
member.summary: Validations are shown for each individual control when it is modified.

member.name: F:SS.Mvc.Angular.ValidationMode.FormSubmitted
member.summary: Validations are shown after the user tries to submit the form

member.name: F:SS.Mvc.Angular.ValidationMode.Always
member.summary: Validations are always displayed.

member.name: T:SS.Mvc.Angular.AngularForm`1
member.summary: Represents an HTML form element in an MVC view that contains AngularJS bindings.
